channel.title: Karabiner Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 10.5.8
item.description:
About v10.5.8 Update

  • v10.5.8: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.5.7: Minor update.
  • v10.5.6: Add "Sort by name" and "Sort by created" button in Preferences > Menu bar.
  • v10.5.5: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.5.4: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.5.3: Minor update.
  • v10.5.2: Prepared settings have been updated.
  • v10.5.1: A broken prepared setting has been fixed:
    "Disable an internal keyboard while external keyboards are connected."
Karabiner Web Site
